text:
And
               
              let
               
              us
               
              not
               
              be
               
              dainty
               
              of
               
              leave-taking

speaker: MALCOLM
text:
But
               
              shift
               
              away
              .
               
              There’s
               
              warrant
               
              in
               
              that
               
              theft

speaker: MALCOLM
text:
Which
               
              steals
               
              itself
               
              when
               
              there’s
               
              no
               
              mercy
               
              left
              .
